ChangeList.Description: Added the [deletePasswordSingleSignOnCredentials](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/user-deletepasswordsinglesignoncredentials?view=graph-rest-beta) method to the [user](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/user?view=graph-rest-beta) resource for deleting the [password-based single sign-on](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/passwordsinglesignoncredentialset?view=graph-rest-beta) credentials for a user to a given service principal.

[getPasswordSingleSignOnCredentials](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/user-getpasswordsinglesignoncredentials?view=graph-rest-beta) method to the [user](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/user?view=graph-rest-beta) resource for retrieving the [password-based single sign-on](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/passwordsinglesignoncredentialset?view=graph-rest-beta) credentials for a user.
